column4: I need to check the LAN connection of my server with an internal machine. I have no physical access. The LAN is down. There are two possibilities: LAN is disconnected, or the second internal machine is down. How can I check this? (the distance between the servers is 30km, so it is important question)
if LAN is disconnected or if the machine is down  turned off ) then you need o take a drive
Yes I must take a ride, but the question is to which server house :)
